name: Get Me Out Of Here!
description:
The experiment's breached containment and the power's failed so it's pitch black in there. It looks like Dr. Shelley's still alive. Guide him to safety.

As far as I know this game only works in Google Chrome for desktops

Made by @machine_screen Follow me for more stuff like this

Ambience and radio sound FX by @adamrustidge

Switch sound FX courtesy of kenney.nl
